Om

The challenge we're facing isn't complexity. It's adaptability. That means a fundamental shift in skills, relationships and worldview is needed.

Erik is a father, an award winning global speaker and bridge builder. For more than a decade he's been a pioneering global voice for the importance of inner development as the driver for social change.

Today, he is one of Europe's leading voices on navigating complexity, adapting to change and leading the sustainability transformation. Erik's presentation style uniquely uses research to create lived experiences for the audience that integrates powerful insights and shift deep perspectives.

Speaker of the Year, 2025. Top ten All-time Best Speakers in Sweden, Awarded 2021. Speaker of the Year 2011, as the youngest recipient to date.

Erfarenhet

Chair of the Board of Directors
Ekskäret Foundation
2013 - Nu
The Ekskäret Foundation is a Swedish non-profit organisation which aims to facilitate the co-creation of a more conscious and sustainable society.
Stockholm
Co-founder & Board Member
Inner Development Goals
2020 - Nu
The Inner Development Goals is a non-profit, open-source global initiative that brings the power of inner development to the UN's Sustainable Development Goals.
CEO
29k
2016 - 2021
29k is the world's first non-profit and free platform for inner development and mental health.
